title: Euphoria In The Streets: New York City's Pride Festival Celebrates Marriage Equality
teaser: Rain hasn't put a damper on the celebrations across the city, NPR's Alexandra Starr reports. Some two million people are expected to hit the streets for Gay Pride events days after the Supreme Court ruled in favor of same-sex marriage.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
